thread.section_title: Multitrip Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Multitrip | www.multitrip.com
thread.title: Deirdre Dempsey

author: Deirdre Dempsey
title: Deirdre Dempsey
text:
As you can read below i was having issues logging in amd printing my cert which was giving me an issue with my holiday . Kim from customer care ireland rang me first thing this morning and solved my issue quickly and couldnt have been more helpful and really nice to deal with. Thanks again Kim.
The site will not allow me to access the account to get the insurance documents. I've changed my password multiple times and still cannot get in. I need to present this document on arrival at my destination to have permission to go on the slopes. So if I can't get this document my ski holiday now turns into to me sitting in the hotel while all of my friends have a great time.
